I knew the exact placement was before.
So now we have situations like this and you are washing your hands clean of the shit show related to this along with your affair with Kevin Otero,
hiding an lying about it to me, and then blowing up the Moyer family. Have a freaking spine. Own something you did wrong, anything, like the
Xfinity account. You just are not capable or big enough to ever find the least bit of fault with yourself.

I gave you exactly what you need below.
I thought you said you would not poke? That is exactly what your last paragraph is.
